title: #17: Answering Listener Questions about The People vs O. J. Simpson and more
description:
Jim Clemente (Former FBI profiler and Writer for Criminal Minds) and Lisa Zambetti (Casting Director for Criminal Minds) answer questions from e mails and the Facebook group about the program "The People vs OJ Simpson" as well as people in abusive relationships reaching out for help.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
